name: Ankit Hardware
overview:
Incorporated in the year 1986, we, “Ankit Hardware”, are a noted manufacturer of an exemplary array of Sliding Roller Wheel and Sliding Window Locks. In order to meet the varied industry requirements, we are offering DR22 Roller Regular Series Double Bracket, Domal Regular Double Wheel Rod, Domal Regular Single Wheel Rod, Domal Regular Double Wheel, Domal Regular Single Wheel and DR45 Roller Regular Series Double Glass Section.

Our Team: Engineers Managers Logistic personnel Procuring agents Quality analysts Sales and marketing personnel Skilled & semi-skilled laborers Warehouse & packaging personnel Administration personal

Our Infrastructure: In order to manufacture and supply of our gamut of Sliding Roller Wheel and Sliding Window Locks, we have established a world class infrastructure. It is widely sprawling and installed with advanced tools, machines and equipment so that we can execute our every business activity in a well-organized manner.

Our Quality Assurance: We have adopted a strict quality policy and follow it in all our business activities. In our domain, we are well-recognized as a quality-centric manufacturer and supplier of Sliding Roller Wheel and Sliding Window Locks. We manufactured these products with ultra-grade raw material implementing sophisticated technologies.

Client Satisfaction: Owing to our consistent record of hundred client-satisfaction since our inception, we have been able to be recognized amongst the leading firms of our domain. We are a client-focused manufacturer and supplier of a quality-assured array of Sliding Roller Wheel and Sliding Window Locks.
